label: df
peekOfCode:
df = pd.read_csv('batch.csv')
# List of column headers to be dropped
columns_to_drop = ['Operator','Flight','Registration','cn','Fatalities','Ground']  # Replace with your column names
# Drop the desired columns by header value
df = df.drop(columns=columns_to_drop, axis=1, errors='ignore')
# Save changes to the CSV file
df.to_csv('file.csv', index=False)
